amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on the importation of cattle with bovine spongiform encephalopathy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2116 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2116 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S14106-14107; text: CR S14106) To express the sense of the Senate on the importation of cattle with bovine spongiform encephalopathy.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2116 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2116 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
